text:
I enjoyed a great town hall this morning with local community and business leaders in Fort Worth.

Thank you @FTWChamber for hosting this important conversation about what’s happening in Washington, D.C., and the work being done to support our growing city. https://t.co/3sEDxHftdW

Great to join @RyanSchmelzFOX on @foxnewsradio.

Housing affordability is a major issue for our nation. Passing my Homeowner Energy Freedom Act will repeal costly red tape and help lower the cost of new homes. https://t.co/z8o0t7ayt1

Today, I joined all but two of my Republican colleagues and voted to avoid a government shutdown with a clean, short-term funding bill. 

This gives Congress time to pass a more fiscally responsible budget that cuts wasteful spending and invests in our nation’s future. https://t.co/Ux1XJLhqTo
It was so nice to meet with a great group of Texans representing @AmericanCancer  today at my office in Washington D.C. #ProtectCancerCures https://t.co/f2ZMYFh2iV
It was an honor to attend a vigil for Charlie Kirk tonight at the U.S. Capitol. May his memory be a blessing. 🇺🇸 https://t.co/eAhfcWIg3K

This week, I voted for the defense bill which cuts wasteful spending, takes care of our service members, supports our allies, advances the policy of peace through strength, and continues to promote and fund the F-35, the pride of Fort Worth. 🇺🇸 https://t.co/84aCMPwblC

On this solemn day, we remember the tragic terrorist attacks against our nation and honor all the innocent lives lost.

We will never forget the bravery of the first responders who gave their lives to save their fellow Americans. https://t.co/kUZOQ0ZEhQ
Please join me in praying for Charlie Kirk and his family during this heartbreaking and horrific attack on his life.

President Biden halted border wall funding and caused the border crisis.

Alongside @POTUS, @HouseGOP are investing billions to secure our borders and make America SAFE again. https://t.co/drtuNdoDd2

I’m proud to have voted for no tax on tips, so Texans can keep more of their hard-earned money.

Here are some of the many workers that benefit:
✅ Waiters
✅ Bartenders
✅ Cosmetologists
✅ Barbers
✅ Valet drivers
✅ Rideshare drivers
https://t.co/CVwkjKYSmL

The federal government has a spending problem, not a revenue problem. If Congress is serious about cutting costs, we should codify @DOGE by creating a Sunset Commission, like the one we have in Texas.

Read my piece in @dcexaminer.
https://t.co/VwKmPfHmRB

Thank you @NAHBhome for your support of the Homeowner Energy Freedom Act.

This bill could save homebuyers up to $31,000 on the cost of a new home.
What a tremendous honor to join the @GOPMajorityWhip and so many of my freshmen @HouseGOP colleagues as we met with the @IsraeliPM in Jerusalem.

Last month, I joined @POTUS for the signing of the One Big Beautiful Bill.

This incredible bill delivers real results for all Americans! It secures major tax relief, invests in border security, strengthens our national defense, and cuts $1.5 trillion in wasteful spending. https://t.co/EiscjjOMzq

Proud that my team has helped recover more than $1 million for Texans in #CD12 since the start of the year!

My team and I are here to serve you. If we can help, please call 202-225-5071 or visit https://t.co/CiiQGidDLf. https://t.co/gQIqUcXpjB

The Biden administration’s climate agenda restricted Americans’ freedoms and wasted billions in taxpayer dollars.

Repeal the rules. Rescind the funding. https://t.co/RW2Pgz8p3X

Today, I introduced the Homeowner Energy Freedom Act to restore consumer choice and protect affordable home energy options.

It’s time to end the Biden administration’s extreme green energy mandates for homes. https://t.co/R4WCEcOKnw

My first job in D.C. was as an intern for Senator Phil Gramm. Today, I was thrilled to have the opportunity to speak with Congressional interns from Texas and across the nation.

The future of America is bright with these young leaders! https://t.co/kXWRAv888c

The One Big Beautiful Bill delivers real results for Texans. Among so many other great things, it provides tax relief, strengthens our border protection, and eliminates taxes on tips and overtime pay. 

Read more in my piece in @startelegram.
https://t.co/wruStezrkX

Today, I’m thrilled to announce that former U.S. Secretary of the Army and Congressman Pete Geren will chair our Military Academy Nomination committee. 

Pete is a true Fort Worth statesman and one of the most respected leaders in our city. He has exemplified integrity and honor during his distinguished service to our nation, and I’m honored he is going to take on this role for our office.

Early this morning, my @HouseGOP colleagues and I sent a bill to @POTUS’s desk to cut $9 billion in wasteful federal government spending.

We must continue working to save taxpayer dollars and create a more efficient government. https://t.co/3hQkaUe0HJ

Today, I joined @RepChipRoy and my Texas delegation colleagues in a moment of silence for the victims of the devastating floods in the Texas Hill Country. 

Our prayers are with the many families across our great state, and gratitude for the many first responders and volunteers still working in and along the Guadalupe River.

We all continue to pray for those impacted by the devastating floods in the Hill Country. Texas is a special state and her people are extraordinary. So many have done so much to help others and we will continue to do so for the days and weeks and months ahead.

Special thanks to the first responders, volunteers, and officials on the ground working tirelessly during this difficult time.

We cherish the memories of all those we have lost and pray for their families.

On this day we give thanks to those brave men who 249 years ago literally put their lives on the line to seek a new and better way of life for their families. The birth of a new nation that today is the greatest country in the world! Happy July 4th! 🇺🇸
https://t.co/Ex2MaqMINa

It’s simple, we are not cutting Medicaid for anyone who needs it. We are getting the millions of able-bodied adults who choose to sit on their couch all day, back to work.

Great to join @StevenDialFox4 on @FOX4 to discuss the incredible One Big Beautiful Bill.

Congratulations @SpeakerJohnson @SteveScalise @GOPMajorityWhip @RepLisaMcClain and the entire @HouseGOP for passing The One Big Beautiful Bill today.  It’s now headed to @POTUS. This is a MAJOR piece of legislation to better our country and improve the lives of our citizens. https://t.co/SdmxV741i1

Today, my @HouseGOP colleagues and I sent the One Big Beautiful Bill to @POTUS’ desk!

This bill prevents the largest tax increase in American history. https://t.co/eNfwpOTUc1

The One Big Beautiful Bill delivers for Texans!

✅ Prevents largest tax hike in US history
✅ Reimburses Texas for border security
✅ Provides tax relief for seniors
✅ Increases defense spending 
✅ No tax on tips and overtime
✅ Strengthens Medicaid https://t.co/vQ33Vd2Rmq
In just ONE week!!!!

Today, I proudly voted for @JudgeCarter’s bill to support our military and veterans. 🇺🇸

The bill strengthens our national defense, fully funds veterans’ benefits, supports military families, and addresses veteran homelessness. https://t.co/7iwQifabG0
Way to lead @SecretaryTurner! We in the federal government need to find all ways to save the American taxpayer money and there is no reason for HUD to stay in a decaying, costly federal building.

Enjoyed talking with @cbs11jack on @CBSNewsTexas.

The One, Big, Beautiful Bill delivers massive tax relief for middle-class Americans, with no tax on tips and overtime, and cuts wasteful spending. https://t.co/LmFzVOVM3R

Candidate Donald Trump pledged to restore our reputation in the world by following a philosophy of peace through strength. President Donald Trump has done that in just five months in office. God Bless all of our U.S. Military forces who took part in tonight’s mission. 🇺🇸

Today, my @HouseGOP colleagues and I voted to codify $9.4 billion in DOGE cuts.

No more taxpayer funding for:
❌ DEI business policies in Serbia
❌ LGBTQI+ programs in Uganda
❌ Electric buses in Rwanda
❌ Net Zero cities in Mexico
❌ Sesame Street in Iraq https://t.co/FKkQU3QqoE

Fentanyl is the #1 killer of 18-45 year olds in America.

That’s why I supported @SenBillCassidy’s HALT Fentanyl Act to provide law enforcement with the tools to combat this crisis.

We must end the poisoning of the American people. https://t.co/zOOMUudTNW

Enjoyed joining @RepBlakeMoore and @RepFeenstra on the @RepublicanStudy podcast. 

We had a great conversation on the One, Big, Beautiful Bill and tonight’s Congressional Baseball Game!

Listen to the episode: https://t.co/t0W8gV58eN https://t.co/j1RsOG4ipw

Nuclear energy is a vital source of abundant and reliable power for our nation.

Thank you @SecretaryWright for joining our @HouseCommerce hearing today to discuss how we can unleash U.S. energy production.

Great to join @wfaa to discuss why the One, Big, Beautiful Bill will benefit Texans.

This important bill will prevent the largest tax hike in U.S. history, fund border security, increase defense spending, and return more than $11 billion to the State of Texas. https://t.co/uHEBA5YEdF

We honor and remember those who were so brave and sacrificed everything 81 years ago today. This interview is a must watch: 
https://t.co/mGbHy8irW0

Thank you @RepPfluger for hosting our @HouseCommerce colleagues in the Permian Basin to meet with leaders in the energy industry.

The work the men and women in West Texas do every day not only helps fund the State of Texas, but also provides energy to people throughout the United States and around the world.

In November, Americans voted for new ideas and a new path forward in how our government operates. This morning, the @HouseGOP voted to send the One, Big, Beautiful Bill to the Senate to deliver on those promises.

This bill lowers taxes, funds border security, promotes energy production, strengthens Medicaid, and cuts wasteful spending.

Advancing the One Big Beautiful Bill will be a WIN for Americans.

✅Removes 1.4 million illegal aliens from Medicaid
✅Stops taxpayer funding for transition surgeries for minors
✅Prevents the largest tax hike in US history
✅Ends green energy handouts
✅Funds border security
No one more deserving. Congratulations @RepPfluger!

Thank you @POTUS. My constituents who work for @LockheedMartin in #CD12 are more than ready, willing and able to manufacture more F35s. 
Thousands of American jobs! 🇺🇸

After months of work and a 26 hour long hearing @HouseCommerce just passed our portion of the Big Beautiful Bill to:

✅ Secure Medicaid for those in need
✅ Remove from the rolls able-bodied people who can work and illegal immigrants
✅ Cut billions in wasteful federal spending https://t.co/5mKM1BxL88
We must strengthen Medicaid for seniors, pregnant women, children, and people with disabilities—not for illegal immigrants or able bodied people who choose not to work.

I’m honored to have joined @POTUS in the Oval Office for the signing of my bill, H.J. Res. 75, which lowers the cost of living for Americans by repealing some of the Biden administration’s costly regulations.
 
I will keep working to lower costs for Americans! https://t.co/CnJ9kMGC3o

Thank you @RepMikeCollins for your support in repealing Biden’s green energy policy mandates. 

Thankfully, the current @POTUS favors returning to common sense policies that don’t cost American citizens extra money!

The Senate has passed H.J.Res. 75! Thank you to our Senate sponsor @SenAshleyMoody for ushering through the legislation which supports small businesses and lowers costs for hardworking Americans.

It now heads to the desk of @POTUS! https://t.co/a93jnZN1Xi

Today, I voted for measures from @RepJames and @JayObernolte to repeal California-led Green New Deal mandates on vehicles. These rules would raise prices and limit choices for consumers across the nation.

California doesn’t get to dictate vehicle policies for the nation. https://t.co/4ZfSgs3HmT

For years, we had a President who allowed millions of illegal aliens to flood across our borders. In 100 days, @POTUS has secured the border. The difference is clear:

✅ Daily apprehensions are down 94%
✅ Known gotaways are down 90%
✅ 100,000+ illegal aliens have been deported https://t.co/hnWXeXFrLJ

I’m proud to have co-sponsored and voted for the Take It Down Act to combat deepfake revenge porn.

Thanks to my constituent Elliston Berry from Aledo, and many other young adults who bravely shared their stories. You all played a powerful role in moving this bill forward, and now it heads to the desk of @POTUS for him to sign into law.

Cutting red tape is essential to increasing the supply of abundant and affordable energy for Americans.

Thank you, @POTUS, for your focus on promoting U.S. energy dominance!
Enjoyed visiting @BellFlight’s Manufacturing Technology Center to examine its emerging manufacturing capabilities with Bell CEO Lisa Atherton and my colleague @RepEllzey. https://t.co/emGcmXI1Pg

Wasteful government spending must end. Here are clear examples of waste and fraud:

💰 $22.6 billion in aid to illegal migrants
💰 $7.5 billion for a few dozen electric vehicle charging stations
💰 $382 million in fraudulent unemployment claims

For more: https://t.co/YqVdlaIfXv https://t.co/OGw5w8WnQA

I fully support @RepFedorchak’s bill to phase out costly taxpayer-funded subsidies for wind and solar energy.

The federal government shouldn’t be in the game of picking winners and losers.

I was proud to co-sponsor and vote for a bipartisan supported bill led by my fellow Texan, @RepChipRoy, to secure our election system.
  
This bill:
✅ Removes non-citizens from voter rolls
✅ Holds election officials accountable
✅ Requires proof of U.S. citizenship to vote https://t.co/M81pUA6oiq

It was great to be in Fort Worth with Tracy Matheson, Kimberly Chapman, Shelby Hopson, and many other local leaders at the Tarrant County Sexual Abuse Advisory Council Conference.
Thank you for the great work y’all do to protect and support women in our community. https://t.co/KkZy0zfXVK

Last week, the House passed my bill to repeal the Biden administration’s costly regulations on refrigerators and freezers.

This is a necessary measure to protect small businesses and prevent higher prices for consumers.

Read my piece in @TheHillOpinion:
https://t.co/5jBpoE6pa9

The House has passed my resolution to repeal costly regulations on commercial refrigerators and freezers.

Thank you to all my colleagues who backed this measure. @HouseGOP is supporting small businesses and ending burdensome regulations. https://t.co/xRYJfi0D6i

My first bill is up for a vote today. It repeals Biden regulations that would impose an $8 billion burden on small businesses and consumers.

Americans voted for common sense and freedom from government overreach. Let’s honor that mandate and support small businesses nationwide. https://t.co/zIsB7wCJHh

Before leaving office, the Biden administration imposed extreme standards on commercial refrigerators and freezers, which will cost Americans $8 billion.

This week, @HouseGOP will vote on my bill to repeal this burdensome red tape and shield small businesses from rising costs. https://t.co/Iy7blR3DtV

Alongside @POTUS, I'm committed to ending wasteful government spending. 

Today, I’m launching my Government Waste Tracker—making it easy for Americans to see the extreme waste that @DOGE has uncovered. 

Click the link to see $23 billion+ in waste: https://t.co/YqVdlaIfXv https://t.co/3lKhsFLmhF

I was honored to present an American flag that flew over the U.S. Capitol to Jeff DeWitt. 

Thank you for your nearly 40 years of service to @FortWorthFire and our community. Congratulations on your well-deserved retirement! https://t.co/WHGqfDyjdn

We must safeguard the integrity of women's sports. Female athletes deserve the opportunity to compete safely and fairly on the world’s biggest stage.

I signed on to @RepBurgessOwens' letter calling on the Olympic Committee to uphold fair competition for women.

Today, I voted with my @HouseGOP colleagues to keep the government working for the American people.

This bill:
✅ Avoids a shutdown
✅ Funds veterans’ healthcare 
✅ Ensures uninterrupted Medicare and Medicaid services https://t.co/FUG9vjBOKm

Well said, @SpeakerJohnson. Masked pro-Hamas individuals have been terrorizing college campuses, breaking the law, and intimidating American students.

I’m co-sponsoring @RepMcDowell’s Unmasking Hamas Act to hold masked criminals accountable.

Offshore drilling is key to lowering energy costs, but the Biden administration's extreme energy regulations have burdened production and driven up prices for Americans.

Today, I voted for @SenJohnKennedy's measure to cut unnecessary red tape and support energy production. https://t.co/G2xVbS4CD7

President Trump recognized several Texans during his joint address.

Elliston Berry, DJ Daniel, Roberto Ortiz, and Alexis Nungaray have overcome incredible hardships, and their strength inspires not only Texas but the entire nation. https://t.co/O4DlEe5FZb

.@SylvesterTurner wasn’t just a tremendous State Rep, Mayor and Congressman, he was a tremendous friend. He was passionate, extremely smart and respected by all who knew and worked with him. Texas lost a legend today. #txlege https://t.co/cHxryInr1s

President Donald Trump’s address last night presented a brighter future for the U.S. He is putting America back on track!

Already, he has:
✅ Reopened offshore drilling 
✅ Reined in wasteful government spending 
✅ Reduced illegal border crossings to record lows https://t.co/Wo1CAG55KG

College is first and foremost about getting an education. 

Today's @HouseCommerce hearing highlighted the need for Congress to ensure education remains at the cornerstone of the student-athlete experience. https://t.co/eaIV6ZyzTR
Congratulations to @BoswellGirlsbb and @tcuwbb on their historic championship victories this past weekend! Great job to these incredible athletes! https://t.co/Wq9jm5lRUA

The Biden Administration implemented a rule that will restrict gas water heaters, driving up consumer costs. Today, I voted for @USRepGaryPalmer’s initiative to overturn this excessive government overreach.
 
It’s simple—I support keeping living costs low for American families. https://t.co/GxIB7IbyYN

I presided over the House Floor today as @HouseGOP members spoke on the ongoing and horrific tragedy afflicting the Israeli people. For over 500 days, Hamas has held innocent Israelis hostage.

America stands firmly with Israel. 🇺🇸🇮🇱 https://t.co/K841fr7Us7

In its final months, the Biden Administration imposed a natural gas tax that will burden energy companies and drive up energy costs.

I co-sponsored and voted for @RepPfluger’s bill to repeal this harmful rule.

Americans need abundant, affordable energy—not far-left policies. https://t.co/wZUrLaaQuU

Today, I voted for the @HouseGOP bill that starts the budget process to:

✅ Invest in border security
✅ Unleash American energy production
✅ Cut government waste and increase savings https://t.co/zPNGzEu2V6

It has been 500 days since Hamas brutally murdered, raped, and took so many innocent civilians hostage. ALL hostages must be released.

America stands unwaveringly with our ally, Israel. 🇺🇸🇮🇱
Congratulations to Fort Worth’s own @BrookeLRollins on becoming the US Secretary of Agriculture!

On December 7, 2022, Border Patrol Agent Raul Gonzalez tragically lost his life while pursuing illegal aliens.

To honor his legacy, I co-sponsored and voted for @RepCiscomani’s Agent Raul Gonzalez Officer Safety Act to ensure illegal aliens who evade Border Patrol are punished. https://t.co/D0pYkzERQ7

On their way out the door, the Biden Administration pushed through over 1,400 regulations, placing costly burdens on American businesses.
 
Today, I co-sponsored and voted for @RepAndyBiggsAZ’s Midnight Rules Relief Act to help Congress roll back these burdensome regulations. https://t.co/3IMlco1Xu6

I thoroughly enjoyed spending time this morning with a group of students at the U.S. Capitol from @PaschalFWISD in @CityofFortWorth. Thanks for making the trip up to DC and for all the great questions. Safe travels home. https://t.co/hTrBrry8vF

Honored to have presided over the House Floor today.

@HouseGOP is working hard to get this country back on track! https://t.co/2sD3nxMIIB

Fracking is critical to Texas’ natural gas and oil production—that’s why I co-sponsored and voted for @RepPfluger’s Protecting American Energy Production Act.

This bill prevents future executive branch attempts to unilaterally ban fracking. https://t.co/EvChz7xVPQ

It was a great honor and privilege to meet with Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu today with @RepDavidKustoff and @RepBrianMast. The United States remains a strong and loyal ally of Israel. 🇺🇸 🇮🇱 https://t.co/NnWyUZnPRX

Today, I co-sponsored and voted for the HALT Fentanyl Act. 

This bill equips law enforcement with the necessary tools to combat drug smuggling operations emboldened by the Biden Administration’s open border policies. https://t.co/lERE5UI5BO

Yesterday’s @HouseCommerce hearing underscored that lowering energy prices requires:

✅ More pipelines
✅ More oil production
✅ More gas production https://t.co/28l7jqm1sQ

Great conversation today with my friends from @NTxCommission about investing in the future of North Texas.

Thanks for visiting my office! https://t.co/cxYlLMvnm0
Great news! @POTUS is going all out to secure the border and reduce the flow of fentanyl.

Please join me in praying for all those who tragically lost their lives last night. 

My heart goes out to their grieving families, and I extend my deepest gratitude to the first responders.

President Trump has signed @RepMikeCollins’ Laken Riley Act into law!

@HouseGOP is working to restore the safety and security of our nation.
Good!

Today, we solemnly remember the six million Jews murdered during the Holocaust.

Even now, the persecution of Jewish people persists, as Hamas holds many innocent civilians against their will.

Join me in praying for the swift release of ALL of the hostages. #NeverAgain https://t.co/QusyhEgHx9
Thank you @POTUS for advancing America’s energy independence!

Today, I voted in favor of @RepAnnWagner’s Born-Alive Abortion Survivors Protection Act, which protects newborn babies that survive an attempted abortion.
 
Simply put, a baby born alive after an attempted abortion deserves the same medical treatment as any other baby.
Tune in to my first Communications and Technology Subcommittee hearing ⬇️

When I ran for Congress, I promised to tackle our broken immigration system. Today I voted to send the Laken Riley Act to President Trump’s desk.

This commonsense immigration bill will make communities safer by requiring ICE to detain and take custody of criminal illegal aliens. https://t.co/I0aViGHsJN

On day one, President Trump is signing executive actions to secure the border and restore energy independence. 

Terrific news especially for Texas. Peace and prosperity being restored in America!

Congratulations to President Donald Trump on officially becoming the 47th President of the United States! 

I look forward to working with you and your administration to get this country back on track! https://t.co/yKRGDR9xGu

Today, I co-sponsored and voted for @RepNancyMace's Violence Against Women by Illegal Aliens Act.

The bill makes illegal aliens convicted of a sex crime or domestic violence inadmissible and deportable.

This is an important step to making America safer! https://t.co/gitQ1cjADD

I am honored to join these three @HouseCommerce Subcommittees:

- Energy
- Commerce, Manufacturing, & Trade
- Communications & Technology

Today, I attended the first meeting of the full @HouseCommerce Committee. 

I am eager to get to work to put the United States back on the right track! https://t.co/RxWeutrGXN

As a state representative, I voted to protect women's and girls' sports.

Today, I was proud to bring Texas values to DC to co-sponsor and vote for @RepGregSteube's Protection of Women and Girls in Sports Act.

We must ensure fair and safe competition for female athletes!

After the International Criminal Court (ICC) issued an outrageous arrest warrant against Prime Minister Netanyahu, I was glad to support @RepChipRoy’s Illegitimate Court Counteraction Act. 

This bill protects America and its allies from illegitimate prosecutions by the ICC. https://t.co/2EGRp6to2m
With severe winter weather expected tomorrow, please take precautions to keep you and your loved ones safe.

Alongside my @HouseGOP colleagues, I voted in favor of the Laken Riley Act. It requires ICE to detain and take custody of illegal aliens who commit theft-related crimes.

This commonsense policy better protects Americans from the harmful effects of Biden’s open-border policies.

On January 3rd, 2025, I was thankful to have my family by my side as I was sworn in as the United States Congressman for the Texas 12th Congressional District.

As a 4th generation Fort Worth native, it’s an incredible honor to serve the community that I was born and raised in. https://t.co/BbkCwYU3ip
